intro.title: How NewNew works
intro.text: First time? Here’s a quick rundown of the things you can do on NewNew...

events.title: Events
events.text: You send bids to creators with what you want them to do and how much you’ll to spend to see it happen. When the time’s up on the Event, the creator chooses their favorite bid and uploads a video of themselves doing it. You can come up with your own unique bid idea or you can back someone’s bid to make sure it gets chosen.

superpolls.title: Superpolls
superpolls.text: These are paid polls. You can vote on your favorite option and the creator will upload a video doing the option with the most amount of votes. You can also add your own options to the creator’s Superpoll if you subscribe to them...so basically, anything goes!

goals.title: Goals
goals.text: You back a creator’s Goal to watch it come to life. The creator will set a minimum amount of backers they need in order to reach their Goal. Goals are usually unique, interesting and fun. Believe us – this isn’t your typical crowdfunding campaign...
